column5: I made a plan to fish early this morning.weather channel said -20 but my truck said -30.Definatly -30.Dark all the way up to camp and shack was freezing inside.Took a while to warm it up and i didnt have enough clothing on.From 6:30-7:30 i got a dozen fish all around 13-14".perfect.From 7:30-8:30 it got fast and brought up a couple of dozen fish and thats when it quit.Today i also caught a bunch of perch which usually doesnt happen very often but glad it did and all big enough to eat.Feb always has its slow downs and hopefully it picks back up soon.Still a good day in my book.

Now that's more like it John,drooling a little as I look at those eaters haha,do u have to fire up the auger every time you go there to open up the holes?and what type of heating is there? And are there lights? That's enough ? For you,rod

Ron there are 2 shacks there.the one your in is nice and cozy and really warms up.holes will have to be opened when you get there.the shack i fish from is right beside other one but the hole there is always open and heated with a light bulb.they keep minnows there and makes it easy to get them out.colder in that shack.to cold today.lol.
Don't wry I will invite you into out deluxe shack so your toasty warm just don't get to comfy and fall asleep
That will be the first time then that ill fish in there.weather will be much better than to.
John by the looks of the long range forecast I better ask Karla if they have any boats ready
FÃ¹nny Ron.ill garantee you there wont be any open water.
I wouldn't mind standing outside in a little water and just a sweatshirt on the time I'm there,rod
